channel.title: Aryan Bug/Fix Needed
channel.description:
Everytime i run aryan, and it logs out and in for like 3 or 4 times, when a script is running It doesnt close the Welcome Screen anymore, nor doesnt run the script anymore, when i manually close the Welcome screen
Anyone help ?

item.title: Aryan Bug/Fix Needed
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I take it the script doesnt work after that also? This sometimes happens to me, I just let it sit. it either will kick back up in a bit, or you got an error. check the command window

Read full topic
